He was easily defeated by Rance."},{"lineNumber":256284,"originalJapaneseLine":"　えーい、勘違いやろうめ","translatedEnglishLine":"Hey, you’re mistaken, fool!"},{"lineNumber":256285,"originalJapaneseLine":"数日立ったが・・当然ケイブリスはこなかった","translatedEnglishLine":"Several days passed... but naturally, Kebris did not come."},{"lineNumber":256286,"originalJapaneseLine":"うむ、この方法は無理だったか","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm, this method did not work after all."},{"lineNumber":256287,"originalJapaneseLine":"あれから　俺が魔人ケイブリスだと着ぐるみ着て現れた馬鹿とか、","translatedEnglishLine":"Since then, idiots who wore a costume pretending to be Demon Kebris appeared,"},{"lineNumber":256288,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス様を倒して名を上げようとしたい人だけでしたね。","translatedEnglishLine":"but only people who wanted to make a name by defeating Lord Rance."},{"lineNumber":256289,"originalJapaneseLine":"サテラ、それで奴が現れるようだったら解決していたらホーネット様は苦労していない","translatedEnglishLine":"Satella, if that guy had actually appeared, Hornet-sama wouldn't have had such trouble."},{"lineNumber":256290,"originalJapaneseLine":"奴は　最強の弱虫なのだ、勝負などに現れる訳はない","translatedEnglishLine":"He is the strongest coward; there's no way he'd show up for a fight."},{"lineNumber":256291,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス城","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance Castle"},{"lineNumber":256292,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス様、どちらの地域へ魔人退治に出かけますか？","translatedEnglishLine":"Lord Rance, to which region will you go to exterminate the demon?"},{"lineNumber":256293,"originalJapaneseLine":"それとも何か特別な作戦とかされます？","translatedEnglishLine":"Or do you have any special plans?"},{"lineNumber":256294,"originalJapaneseLine":"いや、今は動かない。チャンスを待つのだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"No, I won't move for now. I'll wait for the right opportunity."},{"lineNumber":256295,"originalJapaneseLine":"えっ、でも・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Eh, but..."},{"lineNumber":256296,"originalJapaneseLine":"　これは汎用でも使用するので、短めで","translatedEnglishLine":"This is also used in the general version, so it's brief."},{"lineNumber":256297,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ユーザーとしてイベント飛ばし用として利用すると思うシーン","translatedEnglishLine":"A scene likely used by the user to skip events."},{"lineNumber":256298,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tどこからか来る魔軍の増援を抑えないと勝てない","translatedEnglishLine":"You can't win without suppressing reinforcements from the demon army coming from somewhere."},{"lineNumber":256299,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t伝説の都市シャングリラ怪しい、その存在を知る","translatedEnglishLine":"Learn that the legendary city of Shangri-La is suspicious and exists."},{"lineNumber":256300,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t魔人ケイブリスが居るという情報も得る","translatedEnglishLine":"Also obtain information that Demon Kebris is there."},{"lineNumber":256301,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tシャングリラ攻略に向かう","translatedEnglishLine":"Head towards capturing Shangri-La."},{"lineNumber":256302,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tキナニ砂漠に到着した","translatedEnglishLine":"Arrived at the Kinani Desert."},{"lineNumber":256303,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t砂漠案内人を雇う","translatedEnglishLine":"Hire a desert guide."},{"lineNumber":256304,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t砂漠案内人の先導で進む","translatedEnglishLine":"Proceed led by the desert guide."},{"lineNumber":256305,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tシャングリラの情報","translatedEnglishLine":"Information about Shangri-La."},{"lineNumber":256306,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t３５年前に現れたオアシス都市","translatedEnglishLine":"An oasis city that appeared 35 years ago."},{"lineNumber":256307,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tデスココ王のハーレム","translatedEnglishLine":"King Deskoco's harem."},{"lineNumber":256308,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t２年前から王は現れなくなり踊り子だけが居る","translatedEnglishLine":"For two years, the king has not appeared, and only dancers remain."},{"lineNumber":256309,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t\t\tオアシスーと思ったら、蜃気楼だった","translatedEnglishLine":"I thought it was an oasis, but it was a mirage."},{"lineNumber":256310,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t\t\t裸の女ーと思ったら、蜃気楼だった","translatedEnglishLine":"I thought it was a naked woman, but it was a mirage."},{"lineNumber":256311,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t到着したので砂漠案内人は別れる","translatedEnglishLine":"Having arrived, the desert guide parts ways."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地底湖に到着、休憩
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arrived at the underground lake, taking a break

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 東芝、地下冒険が出来て満足している様子
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Toshiba seems satisfied with being able to explore underground

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ごごごご・・、何か音がした
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gogogogo... I heard some kind of noise

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アスタコ、日立　　５ラウンド目
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Astaco, Hitachi - Round 5

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 日立の戦いを見て東芝王子が燃える
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Prince Toshiba gets fired up watching Hitachi's battle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すごいよ日立、よーし、僕も、何か兵器、兵器・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Amazing, Hitachi! Alright, me too, some kind of weapon, weapon...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今から作ったら間に合わないし
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If I make it now, it won't be ready in time

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうだ、いけーブレイブ号、体当たりだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's right, go Brave! Ram attack!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どかーん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Boom!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょー、なにすんのよーと日立
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey, what are you doing!? says Hitachi

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あわわ・・と振動でふらふらする
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Awawa... wobbled from the vibration

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城、後日談
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance Castle, Epilogue

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 満鉄王、三菱王が居る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mantetsu King and Mitsubishi King are present.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 条約が成立して人類と共に戦う事を誓う。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A treaty is established, and they vow to fight alongside humanity.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 作戦フェイズ、第４ターン、どうでもよいコマンド
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Operation Phase, Turn 4, a trivial command

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance Castle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このような事をしていてはラチがあかん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Doing things like this won't get us anywhere.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人ケイブリスか、敵のボスと一騎打ちで勝負を決める
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon Kebris, I will settle this with a one-on-one duel against the enemy boss.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類の１番えらい俺様が相手になってやる。がははは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I, the greatest of humanity, will be your opponent. Gahaha!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 御触れをだす
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Issue an official notice

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 街中に看板、果たし状・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Posting challenge signs all over town...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんなの来る訳が・・　いえ、現れました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There's no way they would come... No, they actually appeared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、行くぞ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, let's go...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 広場に行くと、ランスを待っていたのは　自称勇者と名乗る男
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When I went to the plaza, the one waiting for Rance was a man who called himself a hero.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自信過剰、俺はケイブリスとやらではないが、世界最強の自負がある
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Overconfident, he said: I'm not Kebris or whatever, but I pride myself as the strongest in the world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類の支配者ランス、お前を倒して俺が人類を指揮してやる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance, ruler of humanity, I'll defeat you and lead humanity myself.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ばーんと簡単にランスに倒される
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Boom! He was easily defeated by Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えーい、勘違いやろうめ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey, you’re mistaken, fool!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 数日立ったが・・当然ケイブリスはこなかった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Several days passed... but naturally, Kebris did not come.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うむ、この方法は無理だったか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, this method did not work after all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あれから　俺が魔人ケイブリスだと着ぐるみ着て現れた馬鹿とか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since then, idiots who wore a costume pretending to be Demon Kebris appeared,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様を倒して名を上げようとしたい人だけでしたね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but only people who wanted to make a name by defeating Lord Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラ、それで奴が現れるようだったら解決していたらホーネット様は苦労していない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satella, if that guy had actually appeared, Hornet-sama wouldn't have had such trouble.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 奴は　最強の弱虫なのだ、勝負などに現れる訳はない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He is the strongest coward; there's no way he'd show up for a fight.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance Castle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様、どちらの地域へ魔人退治に出かけますか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Rance, to which region will you go to exterminate the demon?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それとも何か特別な作戦とかされます？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Or do you have any special plans?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、今は動かない。チャンスを待つのだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, I won't move for now. I'll wait for the right opportunity.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えっ、でも・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Eh, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これは汎用でも使用するので、短めで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is also used in the general version, so it's brief.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ユーザーとしてイベント飛ばし用として利用すると思うシーン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A scene likely used by the user to skip events.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どこからか来る魔軍の増援を抑えないと勝てない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You can't win without suppressing reinforcements from the demon army coming from somewhere.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 伝説の都市シャングリラ怪しい、その存在を知る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Learn that the legendary city of Shangri-La is suspicious and exists.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人ケイブリスが居るという情報も得る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Also obtain information that Demon Kebris is there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シャングリラ攻略に向かう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Head towards capturing Shangri-La.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: キナニ砂漠に到着した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arrived at the Kinani Desert.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 砂漠案内人を雇う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hire a desert guide.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 砂漠案内人の先導で進む
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Proceed led by the desert guide.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シャングリラの情報
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Information about Shangri-La.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ３５年前に現れたオアシス都市
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: An oasis city that appeared 35 years ago.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: デスココ王のハーレム
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: King Deskoco's harem.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ２年前から王は現れなくなり踊り子だけが居る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For two years, the king has not appeared, and only dancers remain.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: オアシスーと思ったら、蜃気楼だった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I thought it was an oasis, but it was a mirage.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 裸の女ーと思ったら、蜃気楼だった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I thought it was a naked woman, but it was a mirage.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 到着したので砂漠案内人は別れる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Having arrived, the desert guide parts ways.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

guide."},{"lineNumber":256305,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tシャングリラの情報","translatedEnglishLine":"Information about Shangri-La."},{"lineNumber":256306,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t３５年前に現れたオアシス都市","translatedEnglishLine":"An oasis city that appeared 35 years ago."},{"lineNumber":256307,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tデスココ王のハーレム","translatedEnglishLine":"King Deskoco's harem."},{"lineNumber":256308,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t２年前から王は現れなくなり踊り子だけが居る","translatedEnglishLine":"For two years, the king has not appeared, and only dancers remain."},{"lineNumber":256309,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t\t\tオアシスーと思ったら、蜃気楼だった","translatedEnglishLine":"I thought it was an oasis, but it was a mirage."},{"lineNumber":256310,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t\t\t裸の女ーと思ったら、蜃気楼だった","translatedEnglishLine":"I thought it was a naked woman, but it was a mirage."},{"lineNumber":256311,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t到着したので砂漠案内人は別れる","translatedEnglishLine":"Having arrived, the desert guide parts ways."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地底湖に到着、休憩
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arrived at the underground lake, taking a break

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 東芝、地下冒険が出来て満足している様子
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Toshiba seems satisfied with being able to explore underground

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ごごごご・・、何か音がした
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gogogogo... I heard some kind of noise

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アスタコ、日立　　５ラウンド目
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Astaco, Hitachi - Round 5

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 日立の戦いを見て東芝王子が燃える
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Prince Toshiba gets fired up watching Hitachi's battle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すごいよ日立、よーし、僕も、何か兵器、兵器・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Amazing, Hitachi! Alright, me too, some kind of weapon, weapon...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今から作ったら間に合わないし
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If I make it now, it won't be ready in time

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうだ、いけーブレイブ号、体当たりだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's right, go Brave! Ram attack!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どかーん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Boom!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょー、なにすんのよーと日立
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey, what are you doing!? says Hitachi

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あわわ・・と振動でふらふらする
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Awawa... wobbled from the vibration

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城、後日談
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance Castle, Epilogue

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 満鉄王、三菱王が居る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mantetsu King and Mitsubishi King are present.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 条約が成立して人類と共に戦う事を誓う。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A treaty is established, and they vow to fight alongside humanity.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 作戦フェイズ、第４ターン、どうでもよいコマンド
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Operation Phase, Turn 4, a trivial command

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance Castle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このような事をしていてはラチがあかん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Doing things like this won't get us anywhere.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人ケイブリスか、敵のボスと一騎打ちで勝負を決める
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon Kebris, I will settle this with a one-on-one duel against the enemy boss.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類の１番えらい俺様が相手になってやる。がははは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I, the greatest of humanity, will be your opponent. Gahaha!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 御触れをだす
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Issue an official notice

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 街中に看板、果たし状・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Posting challenge signs all over town...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんなの来る訳が・・　いえ、現れました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There's no way they would come... No, they actually appeared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、行くぞ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, let's go...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 広場に行くと、ランスを待っていたのは　自称勇者と名乗る男
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When I went to the plaza, the one waiting for Rance was a man who called himself a hero.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自信過剰、俺はケイブリスとやらではないが、世界最強の自負がある
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Overconfident, he said: I'm not Kebris or whatever, but I pride myself as the strongest in the world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類の支配者ランス、お前を倒して俺が人類を指揮してやる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance, ruler of humanity, I'll defeat you and lead humanity myself.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ばーんと簡単にランスに倒される
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Boom! He was easily defeated by Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えーい、勘違いやろうめ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey, you’re mistaken, fool!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 数日立ったが・・当然ケイブリスはこなかった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Several days passed... but naturally, Kebris did not come.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うむ、この方法は無理だったか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, this method did not work after all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あれから　俺が魔人ケイブリスだと着ぐるみ着て現れた馬鹿とか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since then, idiots who wore a costume pretending to be Demon Kebris appeared,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様を倒して名を上げようとしたい人だけでしたね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but only people who wanted to make a name by defeating Lord Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラ、それで奴が現れるようだったら解決していたらホーネット様は苦労していない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satella, if that guy had actually appeared, Hornet-sama wouldn't have had such trouble.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 奴は　最強の弱虫なのだ、勝負などに現れる訳はない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He is the strongest coward; there's no way he'd show up for a fight.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance Castle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様、どちらの地域へ魔人退治に出かけますか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Rance, to which region will you go to exterminate the demon?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それとも何か特別な作戦とかされます？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Or do you have any special plans?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、今は動かない。チャンスを待つのだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, I won't move for now. I'll wait for the right opportunity.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えっ、でも・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Eh, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これは汎用でも使用するので、短めで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is also used in the general version, so it's brief.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ユーザーとしてイベント飛ばし用として利用すると思うシーン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A scene likely used by the user to skip events.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どこからか来る魔軍の増援を抑えないと勝てない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You can't win without suppressing reinforcements from the demon army coming from somewhere.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 伝説の都市シャングリラ怪しい、その存在を知る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Learn that the legendary city of Shangri-La is suspicious and exists.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人ケイブリスが居るという情報も得る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Also obtain information that Demon Kebris is there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シャングリラ攻略に向かう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Head towards capturing Shangri-La.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: キナニ砂漠に到着した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arrived at the Kinani Desert.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 砂漠案内人を雇う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hire a desert guide.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 砂漠案内人の先導で進む
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Proceed led by the desert guide.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シャングリラの情報
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Information about Shangri-La.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ３５年前に現れたオアシス都市
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: An oasis city that appeared 35 years ago.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: デスココ王のハーレム
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: King Deskoco's harem.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ２年前から王は現れなくなり踊り子だけが居る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For two years, the king has not appeared, and only dancers remain.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: オアシスーと思ったら、蜃気楼だった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I thought it was an oasis, but it was a mirage.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 裸の女ーと思ったら、蜃気楼だった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I thought it was a naked woman, but it was a mirage.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 到着したので砂漠案内人は別れる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Having arrived, the desert guide parts ways.
